definition: one of a pair of mobile appendages on the head of e.g. insects and crustaceans
details:
noun
- one of a pair of mobile appendages on the head of e.g. insects and crustaceans
= synonyms: feeler
- an electrical device that sends or receives radio or television signals
= synonyms: aerial
- sensitivity similar to that of a receptor organ
= example: sensitivity similar to that of a receptor organ
= synonyms: feeler
